name: @fylgja/input-group
description: The input group extends upon the `@fylgja/form`. By providing a wrapper that allows for more complex form field styles
author: Fylgja

scripts.build:field: npx sass style-field.scss style-field.css --no-source-map -s compressed -I node_modules
scripts.build:box: npx sass style-box.scss style-box.css --no-source-map -s compressed -I node_modules
scripts.build:default: npx sass input-group.scss input-group.css --no-source-map -s compressed -I node_modules
scripts.build: npm run build:field && npm run build:box && npm run build:default
